function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among construction workers","Impact":"Increased risk of illness, absenteeism, and project delays","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to health and safety guidelines, regular testing, and vaccination","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and ventilation systems","People":"Construction workers, managers, contractors, subcontractors","Owner":"Health and safety managers, project managers, site supervisors"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of employees' health","Impact":"Unidentified illness and potential exposure to others","Mitigation":"Regular health check-ups, symptom monitoring, and reporting protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, wearable health trackers, and reporting platforms","People":"Managers, contractors, subcontractors, employees","Owner":"Health and safety managers, project managers, site supervisors"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education on COVID-19 safety measures","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and non-compliance with safety guidelines","Mitigation":"Employee training, awareness campaigns, and distribution of educational materials","Technologies":"Online training modules, virtual workshops, and interactive educational tools","People":"Construction workers, managers, contractors, subcontractors","Owner":"Health and safety managers, project managers, site supervisors"}]}
